title: Looking for an editor for my book
summary:
Hi everyone,
A brief note, I’ve written a book, and the content is nearly done. You can read all about it here.
The first 90% of the project went well, but I need (well paid) help with the remaining 90% to turn it into a decent book.
This is a ‘for profit’ book, but it will be given away for free to schools, universities and readers/students unable to afford it. So there is a bit of feel-good factor involved.
